attributes.action: David Cameron Vs Nigel Farage, 1 to 1 debate on EU exit poll before it happens.
attributes.background: David Cameroon Vs Nigel Farage, one to one debate on EU Britexit live on TV before the polling date of 23rd June 2016.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament as a whole do not have the power to make the Prime Minister attend a debate. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
